doc.news: Build metamodels with dynamic EMF is available.
Build an Eclipse plug-in to navigate content in an EMF model is available.
Getting Source From CVS updated, including Team Project Sets.
EMF 2.4 & QTV 1.2 Plans are available.
Eclipse EMF Demo - A complete modeling platform for Java is available.
Eclipse Modeling: What's New for Europa is available.
RFC: Standalone Zip? is available.
New Features Migration Guide is available.
Details about Edit API Source Incompatibility are available.
References updated to include links. Please contribute!
Create more -- better -- code in Eclipse with JET added.
Generating Dynamic Ecore from XML Schema added.
Dynamic Browsing & Instantiation Capabilites added.
EMF Wiki Category page added to References.
EMF 2.3 JVM Requirements updated.
JET Tutorial Part 1 (Introduction to JET) updated.
JET Tutorial Part 2 (Write Code that Writes Code) updated.
Details about EMF 2.3 and JDK 5.0 Generics are available.
Since January 2006, there have been over 1,000,000 EMF downloads!
Details about Changes to the EMF Code Merge (2.3.0) are available.
CASCON and OOPSLA presentation & workshop exercises are available.
Search CVS tool launched for tracking CVS changes.
Binding XML to Java published at TheServerSide.com.
EMF Website reskin completed - please update your bookmarks. Report any problems or broken links in Bugzilla.
EMF Corner relaunched as Modeling Corner!
Since January 2006, there have been over 777,000 downloads of EMF (incl. 100,000 of EMF 2.2.0)!
Callisto Podcast Series: Ed Merks is available.
Using The Eclipse Modeling Frameworks (Adobe Breeze Webinar w/ sound, video, and chat transcript) is available.
Since January 2006, there have been over 600,000 downloads of EMF!
EMF 2.2 Release Review presentation published.
Since January 2006, there have been over 400,000 downloads of EMF!
EclipseCon 2006 presentations & project files published.
EMF has the highest liveness of any project at Eclipse.org!
Update Manager site now supports mirrors.
What`s New in EMF 2.1? overview published.
EMF 2.1 vs. EMF 2.0.1 performance results published.
EMF 2.1 Release Review presentation published.
New EMF Validation Framework Overview available on docs page.
EMF, SDO & XSD are now being released as jarred plugins. In addition, two new standalone bundles are available for download.
'Getting EMF Source Files from CVS' and 'Using Eclipse Update Manager to Update EMF, SDO or XSD' updated: XSD is now an EMF subproject, rather than a Technology project.
Accessible (HTML/text) versions of XSD and EMF Powerpoint presentations now available.
EMF Corner submission/review forms working again (email address was disabled). If you've tried to submit or review and never heard back from us, please try again.
EMF Build 2.1.0.I200505191347 contains important and potentially breaking changes. Details here.

The XSD Technology project has moved to Tools, and has become a subproject of EMF. At the same time, the combined site is being migrated from download to www to improve performance. Please report any broken links or errors to codeslave(at)ca.ibm.com.
New NLS packs based on EMF and XSD 2.0.2 are available for download.
EMF, SDO or XSD Plan Docs added.
New SDO tutorial: Using the SDO Data Graph Editor & link to JSF/SDO Redbook
Since April 2004, there have been over 200,000 downloads of EMF, SDO, and XSD!
Since April 2004, there have been over 75,000 downloads of EMF, SDO, and XSD documentation!
What's New, CVS? tool launched for tracking CVS changes (replaced by Search CVS, 2006-09-07).
New Eclipse Corner article: EMF goes RCP.
SDO FAQ split from EMF FAQ for ease of use. Now filterable!
Links to SDO articles added.
EMF Corner launched!
Link to SDO Overview on developerWorks added.
NLS packs for EMF, SDO, and XSD (SDK and Runtime) now available.
Added two new walkthroughs for offline newsgroup searching.
New Update Manager article added.
Since April 2004, there have been over 150,000 downloads of EMF, SDO, and XSD!
Since April 2004, there have been over 50,000 downloads of EMF, SDO, and XSD documentation!
EMF/SDO/XSD Update Manager site bug 70176 fixed - UM now actually works, as of Eclipse 3.0.1.M20040825 or Eclipse 3.1.0.N20040831.
Link to new Kent OCL Library tutorial added.
XSD FAQ updated.
Link to EMF Book sample chapter added.
Since April 2004, there have been over 125,000 downloads of EMF, SDO, and XSD!
Fixed sort by date feature on downloads page. Click Build Date column to sort, or Build Type column to revert.
Since April 2004, there have been over 39,000 downloads of EMF, SDO, and XSD documentation!
Bugzilla links in nav updated to include specific columns and status/milestone/id sort.
Mirrors page updated with more accurate list of mirrors & links. (This page no longer maintained due to new centralized mirror-based download page for all eclipse downloads.)
JavaOne 2004 Presentation added.
List of EMF, SDO & XSD download & documentation mirrors now available. (This page no longer maintained due to new centralized mirror-based download page for all eclipse downloads.)
Two new draft overview documents: EMF FeatureMaps & XML Schema to Ecore Mapping added.
EMF, SDO, and XSD now have an Eclipse 3.0 Update Manager site you can use. Details (including mirror info) posted to the FAQ. Instructions & list of available builds here.
Updated: FAQ, Overviews, Tutorials!
Added links to two new developerWorks articles.

In order to support Rich Client Platform, the org.eclipse.emf.edit.ui plugin now optionally requires org.eclipse.core.resources and org.eclipse.ui.ide and no longer exports these imports. Details here.
To better meet the needs of our users, Runtime bundles no longer contain docs. See SDK bundles for Runtime, Source, and docs. Javadocs are still available online, updated with every new build.
Crimson DOM bug (problem loading/importing XML Schema) added to EMF FAQ & EMF Docs page
Two new developerWorks XSD reprints are available.
Added link to GEF EMF Redbook.
To better meet the needs of our users, EMF & SDO have been combined into one Runtime and one SDK packages, instead of two of each.
To better meet the needs of our users, Source, Runtime, and Docs have been combined into one easier-to-download SDK bundle for each of EMF, SDO and XSD. Runtimes are still available separately.
Updated the Getting EMF Source Files from CVS document.
Added EMF development plan and links to SDO specification and white paper. link
Added EclipseCon Presentation and Steinberg Interview. link
JET Tutorial Part 2 (Write Code that Writes Code) is available.
Eclipse Series book on EMF is available: Eclipse Modeling Framework.
JET Tutorial Part 1 (Introduction to JET) is available.
Getting EMF Source Files from CVS is available.
